dmca.title: Trademark Infringement Notice - dangerdave
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
http://i-deep--throat.com/deepthroat/deepthroat-action-dangerdave.html
and
http://i-deep--throat.com/deepthroat/deepthroat-action-dangerdave.html any
of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 4:05:32 p.m.
(GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: DangerDave [mailto:webmaster@dangerdave.com.au] 
Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2006 11:24 PM
To: clivec@bemail.be
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com; Clare@redchip.com.au
Subject: Trademark Infringement Notice - dangerdave

Sir/Madam,

Trademark infringement -
http://i-deep--throat.com/deepthroat/deepthroat-action-dangerdave.html
and
http://i-deep--throat.com/deepthroat/deepthroat-action-dangerdave.html


I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark: 
Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)

As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material on the
internet.  As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave trademark has become
extremely well known in the adult website space.

It has come to my attention that your company is using a domain name that is
misleadingly, deceptively and confusingly similar to my trademark and my
domain name.

Your company's conduct amounts to blatant infringement of the Dangerdave
trademark in respect of which I am entitled to institute proceedings for
trademark infringement against your company.

Your company's conduct is both misleading and deceptive.

In addition, your company's conduct constitutes passing off and the making
of false representations and breaches.

I have been advised by my solicitors that I am entitled to institute,
immediately, legal proceedings against your company and would be entitled to
an injunction preventing your company from:-

1.      Using the Dangerdave trademark in any manner whatsoever; and
2.      Continuing to make false and misleading representations in relation 
to the services it offers on the internet.

I would be entitled at my election to damages on account of your company's
profits and my legal costs.

Unless you cooperate with my request, I will instruct my solicitors to
immediately institute legal proceedings against you.

I demand that you immediately remove the web pages listed above or change
the name on your website so that it is not substantially identical or
misleading, deceptive or confusingly similar to my trademark.

Unless you fail to comply strictly with my demand within 5 days from the
date of this letter, I will be instructing my solicitors to immediately
commence legal proceedings against your company and be seeking both
interlocutory and permanent injunctions with an account of profit.

Yours faithfully

_______________________________________
'Danger' Dave Higgins
Owner/Director
Darkreach Communications International Pty Ltd
